messages.content: You're an intelligent admin that filters jobs.

We're an operations agency that builds outreach systems, CRM systems, project management systems, no-code systems and integrations.

Below is a job description. Filter it for relevance (true or false) in JSON. Some of the plattforms we use include Airtable, ClickUp, Notion, Webflow, Slack, Discord ChatGPT, Make, Monday, Zapier, LinkedIn, Google Sheets, Shopify. If relevant, write a short introductory icebreaker.

Note:
- API integrations are good, since we can develop them using no-code.
- We don't develop full-stack apps.
- We don't use Python, Telegram, Whatsapp, Facebook, Bubble.io or chatbots.
- We don't work on very tiny projects (like integrations that will take less than 10 minutes to do) or those that require extrememly fast, same-day or 24h-delivery.

Example client projects:
- End to end project management for a $1M/yr copywriting agency
- Outbound acquisition system that grew a contect company from $10K/mo to $90K/mo in 12 mo
- Monday.com CRM and PM for a recruiting company doing > $1M/yr
- Automated content generation system for an SEO agency doing > $10M/yr
- ClickUP CRM build for a marketing company doing $1M/yr

---
Product Review Writer

See attached doc before responding. I need an excellent writer to do 2 product reviews 600-800 words each. I'll provide the products/sites to review.

Product 1: https://trycortexi.com/
Product 2: https://quietumpuls.com/

Budget: $300
Posted On: April 11, 2023 22:07 UTC
Category: Product Reviews
Skills: Writing, English, Proofreading, Content Writing, Review, Creative Writing
Country: United States
---

TikTok Media Buyer

We're looking for a media buyer to specialize in running TikTok ads and other social media plattforms.

You need to be proficient in English.

Budget: $200

Airtable Expert Needed

Need help linking things in Airtable and using interfaces for my company. Content is already in Airtable, just need help maximizing what Airtable can do and organizing it so it's easier to manage.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$60.00

Google Sheets to Monday.com CRM

Help pull data into CRM (Monday.com - Sales and Work Management)

We're an executive recruiting biz. Looking for someone that's VERY familiar with Monday.com (if you haven't useed Monday.com and know it very well, don't bid. Looking to take 3 tabs in Sheets and turn them into a consolidated and connected CRM.

Hourly Range: $40.00-$80.00

On-Page SEO Web Development

Seeking a skilled Web Developer with a strong background in on-page SEO to join our team. Involved transforming an exisitng website into a WordPress.com platform, utilizing the default 2023 theme.

â€‹

ChatGPT Writer

Looking for writers to write 1000-word articles about different books that you're interested in, or you can write multiple articles about the same book! We pay $110 per 1000 words.

Requirements:
- Able to write 3 x 1000 words + articles each day
- Passionate about books

record.fld37qgxPu9didL4Y:
â€‹

A little bit about me: I'm a no-code developer with +4 years of process automation experience. I've implemented dozens of high-performing systems for service firms & e-commerce businesses, many of which that have scaled to $1M+ in sales. I use a variety of plattforms, including Integromat/Make, Airtable and Shopify, and am extremly proficient at documentation, process optimization & backend systems.

I also write a popular newsletter on AI implementations (think GPT-4, Stable Diffusion, etc.) and own a successful e-commerce company, Valued, that does ~$230K/mo.

Most of my Upwork jobs over the last two years have been for various U.S. content agencies, helping them with their marketing, SEO, and so on, but my automation and database work isn't really reflected (yet) on my account. My main goal at the moment is to find new clients to build a strong portfolio.

Let me know if you're interested in working together. Happy to connect long-term â€” or just for this project, if that's what you're looking for.

Below are a few samples of recent systems I've created (website is mine). I can provide dozens of additional examples upon request.

https://www.zynera.ai/work
